short_summary: An information technology consultation services to support existing and upcoming projects.
description: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat requests proposals for Information Technology Consulting Services.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number and Solicitation Number
* `Reference Number: cb-472-7029703`
* `Solicitation Number: 24062-23-594-A`

#### Project Overview
The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) has issued a solicitation for Information Technology (IT) consultation services to support the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects leveraging various technologies. The aim of this project is to ensure efficient and effective management and delivery of IT products or services to TBS clients.

#### Notice Type and Procurement Method
* `Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)`
* `Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering`

#### Evaluation Criteria and Selection Methodology
The evaluation will be conducted with fairness in accordance with the evaluation criteria and selection methodology defined in the RFP. Bidders are expected to submit a bid for the identified resource categories.

#### Tender Definition
The project involves supplementing existing staff to ensure adherence to established project management and delivery processes for new and existing IT projects. The resources required will facilitate the execution and support of existing and upcoming projects, leveraging various technologies.

#### Technical Specifications and Requirements
The solicitation is focused on providing IT consultation services, specifically:

* Information technology consultation services (`UNSpsc: 80101507`, `UNDSPC Description: Information technology consultation services`)

#### Location of Work
The project will be executed within the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Trade Agreements and Acquisition Authority
This solicitation is open to bid by contractors who are considered eligible under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other relevant international trade agreements.

#### Contracting Entity Information
The contracting entity for this project is the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS).

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or concerns, please contact Richard Boyling at `richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca` or (343) 542-9916.

#### Attachments and Additional Information
Please refer to the attached documents for further information about the project: [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32217/23-594-npp-english-version.pdf) and [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32217/23-594-npp-french-version.pdf)
